name: 胡興梅
objective:
為建構多元化台灣社會的民主觀念，並拓展台灣政治發展的時間深度，以加強傳統與現代的有機聯繫，本課程擬從以下方向發展：政治生活與社會生活、政治文化與政治社會化、民粹主義與政治生活、公共意見與投票行為、民主憲政與人權保障、司法正義與司法革新、憲政運作與政治發展、政治秩序與政治發展、中國歷代政治得失等。
To study the time length of the political development of Taiwan and strength of the relationship between the traditional and modern period. Also the establishment of democracy in a multilateral society is to be studied. This class will study the basis of Taiwan society, and explore the following items: political and social life, political culture, socialization, populism. Also included are public opinion and voting orientation, constitution and human rights, the justice and reformation of judiciary, the operation of the constitution and political development, political order and development and an analysis of Chinese politial development.

第十二週：生活的權利與義務

第十四週：生活的私人利益
